import React, { useState } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' export default function RegisterForm() { const url="https://localhost:44313/api/Auth/register"; const [data,setData]=useState({ userName: "", password: "", email:"", confPassword:"" }) function handle(e) { const newdata={...data} newdata[e.target.id]=e.target.value setData(newdata) console.log(newdata) } function submit(e) { e.preventDefault(); if(data.confPassword==data.password){ Axios.post(url,{ userName:data.userName, password:data.password, email:data.email }) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } else{ } } return (
submit(e)} className="sign-up-form">
  • handle(e)} value={data.userName} />
  • handle(e)} value={data.email} />
  • handle(e)} value={data.password} className="sign-up-textinput1 input" />
  • handle(e)} value={data.confPassword} className="sign-up-textinput1 input" />
